title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham City.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality.

title: Superbad
description: Two co-dependent high school seniors try to buy alcohol for a party.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel.
